messages.message: I'm really frustrated! My Windows keeps crashing and I can't get any work done!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Ursula. Let's try to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
It's been days! I can't believe I have to deal with this. What are you going to do to fix it?
I understand your frustration. Can you please provide me with the error messages you're seeing?
There are no clear messages! It just freezes and restarts! I've already tried updating everything.
Thanks for letting me know. Let's try a few troubleshooting steps to see if we can pinpoint the cause.
I just want it to work! I donâ€™t have time for all of this troubleshooting.
I completely understand, and I appreciate your patience. I'll do my best to make this process as smooth as possible.
